product_name: Rafters Malibu Water Shoe - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Make sure your feet are beach- and poolside-ready with these women's Malibu Water Shoes from Rafters. The stretchy neoprene pull-on uppers are made for breathable comfort in wet conditions. A molded rubber sole provides loads of traction in and out of the water. Pull tabs help you get the Rafters Malibu Water Shoes on and off. Special buy.
short_description: Make sure your feet are beach- and poolside-ready with these women's Malibu Water Shoes from Rafters. The stretchy neoprene pull-on uppers are made for breathable comfort in wet conditions.
